project_path.SquidGameToken: contracts/SquidGameToken Full Smart Contract Security Audit/SquidGameToken

findings.title: Out of Gas
findings.description: The function excludeMultipleAccountsFromFees() uses a loop to exclude multiple accounts from fees, which may lead to an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the addresses list is long.
